category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEMBOM_Mirror_MakeRules
preference.preference_description: Defines the key/value pairs of BOM line properties and their corresponding values used to determine if a new manufacturing BOM node is to be created when the me_create_mbom utility is invoked, for each BOM line that matches the criteria. Valid Values: KEY:BOM-line-property-internal-name,VALUE:property-value1[|VALUE:property-value2]KEY:GCS CP,VALUE:Make
